intro: Diplycosia lotungensis, commonly known as the lotungensis diplycosia, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in tropical rainforests. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
